headline: Why Analysts See Bank of America’s Story Evolving Amid Shifting Forecasts and Upgraded Price Targets
summary: Bank of America shares have recently seen a slight upward revision in their fair value estimate, increasing from $55.23 to $57.23 per share. This follows a period of mixed analyst commentary after the company's latest earnings report. Some analysts are boosting their targets due to stronger revenue trends and improved earnings, while others remain cautious about valuation concerns. Stay tuned to learn how you can follow these evolving analyst perspectives and keep informed on the narrative...

headline: Big Tech's AI ambitions are remaking the US power grid. Consumers are paying the price.
summary: Requests from Big Tech for power supply are skyrocketing. If that demand doesn't end up following through, utility companies could be stuck with the bill.
